instructions.introTitle: How to Stake $DWT Tokens on DogWalker?
instructions.intro: Staking your $DWT tokens is a great way to passively earn rewards while supporting the DogWalker ecosystem. Follow this simple step-by-step guide to get started:

1.title: Step 1: Connect Your Wallet
1.content:
• Go to dog-walker-app.netlify.app
  • Click the “Connect Wallet” button in the top menu.
  • Select your preferred wallet (MetaMask, Trust Wallet, etc.) connected to the BNB Smart Chain (BSC).

Make sure your wallet contains $DWT tokens and a small amount of BNB for gas fees.

2.title: Step 2: Check Your Balance
2.content:
After connecting your wallet, your current $DWT balance and staking options will appear:

  • Balance: Available $DWT tokens in your wallet
  • To Stake: Tokens ready to be staked
  • Total Rewards Pool: 20,000,000 DWT available for staking rewards
  • Estimated Rewards: 15% annual yield (1.25% monthly or ~0.041% daily)

3.title: Step 3: Approve the Token
3.content:
• Click the “Unlock Token” button.
  • Confirm the transaction in your wallet to approve $DWT for staking.

    • This is a one-time step that allows the staking contract to interact with your tokens.

4.title: Step 4: Stake Your Tokens
4.content:
• Enter the number of $DWT tokens you want to stake.
  • Click the “Stake” button and confirm the transaction in your wallet.
  • Once confirmed, your staked amount will appear under “Staked Amount” and your share of the pool will update.

5.title: Step 5: Claim Your Rewards
5.content:
• Rewards accumulate daily and are based on your share of the staking pool.
  • Click “Claim Rewards” to receive your earned $DWT tokens directly to your wallet.

You can claim rewards at any time. Make sure to keep some BNB for gas fees.

6.title: Bonus Info
6.content:
• Total Supply: See the current and projected token supply growth in the "Total Supply" chart below.
  • APY: The annual reward rate is dynamic and depends on the total amount staked.
